traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage. You also have advantage on saving throws against illusions and against being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Dwarven Combat Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.description: You gain proficiency with the artisan's tools of your choice: Smith's tools, brewer's supplies, or mason's tools.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

traits.name: Duergar Magic
traits.description: At 3rd level, you can cast the Enlarge/Reduce spell (enlarge only) once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast Invisibility once per long rest. You can't cast these spells in direct sunlight. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for them.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.
